Gets the message-level security properties for the .
Docs.value: A value. The default values include: <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverHttp.ClientCredentialType%2A> is <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageCredentialType>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverHttp.AlgorithmSuite%2A> is <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite.Basic256%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverHttp.NegotiateServiceCredential%2A> is .

## Remarks The object returned specifies detailed message-level security properties for the `wsDualHttpBinding` binding.

Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpSecurity.Message%2A> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized. This is used by WCF for XAML integration.

Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpSecurity.Mode%2A> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized. This is used by WCF for XAML integration.
